thread.title: London Mayor Refuses To Respond To Donald Trump Jr’s Disparaging Tweet
thread.title_full: London Mayor Refuses To Respond To Donald Trump Jr’s Disparaging Tweet

author: Randy DeSoto
title: London Mayor Refuses To Respond To Donald Trump Jr’s Disparaging Tweet
text:
Huckabee Opposes Elimination Of Funding For National Endowment For The Arts 
The tweet included an article published last September in which Khan is quoted saying, terror attacks are “part and parcel of living in a big city.” 
“Nothing is more important to me than keeping Londoners safe,” he went on to say. “I want to be reassured that every single agency and individual involved in protecting our city has the resources and expertise they need to respond in the event that London is attacked.” 
Khan was given the opportunity to respond to Donald Trump Jr.’s attack on CNN Thursday morning. Advertisement - story continues below 
“I know you don’t want to talk politics today, but whether you have a reaction to the sort of knee-jerk tweet that came out of the United States from the president’s son,” CNN’s Christiane Amanpour asked. 
“I’m not going to respond to a tweet from Donald Trump Jr.,” Khan replied, “I’ve been doing more important things over the last 24 hours.” London Mayor Sadiq Khan: "I'm not going to respond to a tweet from Donald Trump Jr, I've been doing more important things over the past 24h" pic.twitter.com/JGibM7vWOT 
The London mayor went on to state that he was in New York City when there was a terror attack last year . Advertisement - story continues below
